hyp: Don't worry, it's only temporary.
tgt: Don't worry. It's only temporary.
src: Не волнуйся. Это только временно.
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: Tom is never where he should be.
tgt: Tom is never where he's supposed to be.
src: Тома никогда нет там, где он должен быть.
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: It's hard for me to work with Tom.
tgt: I have trouble working with Tom.
src: Мне сложно работать с Томом.
label: Hallucination

hyp: Water, please.
tgt: I'd like some water.
src: Воду, пожалуйста.
label: Hallucination

hyp: I didn't expect Tom to betray me.
tgt: I didn't think that Tom would betray me.
src: Я не ожидал, что Том предаст меня.
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: It's not as bad as Tom thinks.
tgt: Things aren't as bad as Tom thinks.
src: Всё не так плохо, как думает Том.
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: Don't complicate it.
tgt: Keep it simple.
src: Не усложняйте.
label: Hallucination

hyp: Why can't you accept me as I am?
tgt: Why can't you accept me as I am?
src: Почему вы не можете принять меня таким, какой я есть?
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: I hate this place.
tgt: I hate this place.
src: Ненавижу это место.
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: Tom is here as a volunteer.
tgt: Tom is there as a volunteer.
src: Том находится там в качестве добровольца.
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: Can I have one too?
tgt: Can I have one, too?
src: Можно мне тоже одну?
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: You're different in life than in a picture.
tgt: You look different than your picture.
src: Ты в жизни не такой, как на фотографии.
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: She started working in her new office.
tgt: She began to get the feel of her new office.
src: Она начала осваиваться в своем новом офисе.
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: I don't have anything to do right now.
tgt: I don't have anything to do now.
src: У меня сейчас нет дел.
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: The equator divides the earth into two hemispheres.
tgt: The equator divides the earth into two hemispheres.
src: Экватор делит землю на два полушария.
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: I would like to become a Christian.
tgt: I would like to become a Christian.
src: Я хотел бы стать христианином.
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: Everyone will be jealous of you.
tgt: Everyone will envy you.
src: Все будут тебе завидовать.
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: Tom bought a new piano.
tgt: Tom bought himself a new piano.
src: Том купил себе новое пианино.
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: Did you know Tom had three brothers?
tgt: Did you know that Tom had three brothers?
src: Вы знали, что у Тома три брата?
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: Don't let Tom jump on the bed.
tgt: Don't let Tom jump on the bed.
src: Не давайте Тому прыгать на кровати.
label: Not Hallucination
